markdownRemark.html:
My idea submitted to Ubuntu Brainstorm hit 363 votes !

Might I ask all you gents to vote for it - the link should be to the right side of the blog.

The idea is:

[caption id="" align=“aligncenter” width=“300” caption=“Idea #23819: Power manager should implement options to extend battery lifespan”][/caption]

There is another idea submitted, but which has not been approved for voting:

[caption id="" align=“aligncenter” width=“300” caption=“Idea #24044: Make it possible to play OSX games in Linux”][/caption]

frontmatter.title: Quick one liner to save a list of gems (with multiple versions) and install on another machine
Ubuntu Lucid: worst ever, KDE 4.4.1: slowest ever
